properties.description: certificate used for inbound and outbound decryption

properties.description: certificate used for inbound and outbound decryption

type.description: The type of managed identity assigned to this resource.

userAssignedIdentities.description: The identities assigned to this resource by the user.

AzureResourceManagerManagedIdentityPrope.description: The properties of the managed service identities assigned to this resource.

clientId.description: The active directory client identifier for this principal.

principalId.description: The active directory identifier for this principal.

AzureResourceManagerUserAssignedIdentity.description: A managed identity assigned by the user.

certificateSignerResourceId.description: Resource Id of certificate signer, to be populated only when certificateSelfSigned is false

etag.description: read only string representing last create or update

CertificateObject.description: certificate used for inbound and outbound decryption

dnsServers.description: List of IPs associated with the Firewall

enabledDnsType.description: Enabled DNS proxy type, disabled by default.

enableDnsProxy.description: Enable DNS proxy, disabled by default.

EndpointConfiguration.description: Endpoint Configuration for frontend and backend

isPanoramaManaged.description: Panorama Managed: Default is False. Default will be CloudSec managed.

isStrataCloudManaged.description: Strata Cloud Managed: Default is False. Default will be CloudSec managed.

strataCloudManagerConfig.description: This field is only present if Strata Cloud Manager is managing the policy for this firewall

FirewallDeploymentProperties.description: Properties specific to the Firewall resource deployment.

backendConfiguration.description: Endpoint Configuration for frontend and backend

frontendConfiguration.description: Endpoint Configuration for frontend and backend

properties.description: certificate used for inbound and outbound decryption
certificate used for inbound and outbound decryption

enableEgressNat.description: Enable egress NAT, enabled by default.

networkType.description: vnet or vwan, cannot be updated.

privateSourceNatRulesDestination.description: Array of ipv4 destination address for which source NAT is to be performed

publicIps.description: List of IPs associated with the Firewall

configString.description: Base64 encoded string representing Panorama parameters to be used by Firewall to connect to Panorama. This string is generated via azure plugin in Panorama

planId.description: plan id as published by Liftr.PAN

panLocation.description: Rulestack Location, Required for GlobalRulestacks, Not for LocalRulestacks

cloudManagerName.description: Strata Cloud Manager name which is intended to manage the policy for this firewall.

StrataCloudManagerConfig.description: This field is only present if Strata Cloud Manager is managing the policy for this firewall
